DOC.brief_summary: The aim study analyze effectiveness physical exercise blood flow restriction diameter flow vessel , muscle strength circumference forearm patient CKD prior make FAV .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Exercise With Flow Restriction Forearm Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Definitions goal General Analyze effectiveness physical exercise blood flow restriction diameter flow vessel , muscle strength circumference forearm patient CKD prior make arteriovenous fistula . Specific - Draw profile patient CKD clinical laboratory feature ( hematocrit , hemoglobin , urea , creatinine ) glomerular filtration rate ; - Assess vascular condition , muscle strength circumference upper limb non-dominant forearm exercise program ; - Compare physical exercise program without blood flow restriction vascular change , muscle strength circumference non-dominant arm ; - To correlate diameter measurement blood flow muscle strength circumference upper limb dominant . Methodology Study design This randomize control trial , blind endow allocation concealment develop Physiotherapy clinic Nephrology Clinical Hospital , Federal University Pernambuco Cardiopulmonary Physiotherapy Laboratory Department Physical Therapy , Federal University Pernambuco , From December 2015 November 2016 , follow approval Committee Ethics Research / Health Sciences Center . After approval Committee Ethics Research / Health Sciences Center accord Resolution 466/2012 National Health Council explanation study , participant ask sign Informed Consent ( IC ) . The recruitment evaluation carry single evaluator , blind randomization , allocation intervention . Inclusion criteria The sample consist patient Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD ) Stage 4 5 , sex , 18 year age , conservative dialysis treatment medical indication arteriovenous fistula achievement hemodialysis . Exclusion criterion Are exclude present cognitive impairment change hinder understanding , realization activity interpretation issue ; history make arteriovenous fistula upper limb type vascular surgery upper limb , type vascular access upper limb nearby region ; develop kind manual work heavy load ; Trauma-orthopedic lesion cervical , shoulder , elbow , wrist untreated ( ) hand ; sign thrombophlebitis hypoplasia / agenesis upper limb . Study design After enrollment nephrology clinic Clinical Hospital / Federal University Pernambuco initially apply Mini-Mental State Examination ( MMSE ) , exclude possibility cognitive impairment . Anamnesis It perform clinic Nephrology , MMSE questionnaire open close question . The data use : sex , age ( year ) , weight ( kg ) , height ( ) , body mass index ( BMI ) , blood pressure ( BP ) ( mmHg ) ( Brazilian Society Cardiology , 2010 ) , etiology stage CKD , serum creatinine ( mg / dL ) urea ( mg / dL ) last test report medical record Glomerular Filtration Rate ( mL / min ) ( Cockcroft ; GAULT , 1976 ) , hematocrit ( % ) hemoglobin ( g / dL ) current medication . These data check interview medical record patient open interview last approximately 15 minute . After date physical examination schedule . Physical exam It hold Cardiopulmonary Physiotherapy laboratory Federal University Pernambuco . The patient designate upper limb non-domimant , accord guideline Kidney Disease Outcomes Quality Initiative Guidelines ( VASCULAR ACCESS WORK GROUP , 2006 ) . Then take place forearm circumference assessment , morphology vessel handgrip strength . This take total duration approximately 50 minute . Circumference forearm The circumference forearm perform perimetry ( tape nylon ) . The patient sit chair supinate forearm elbow flex 90 ° . The tape position distal 2 cm cubital fossa ( KONG et al , 2014 ) . Will hold 3 measurement , register high value . Morphology vessel To evaluate radial artery measure internal cross-sectional diameter ( mm ) flow rate [ systolic peak ( cm / sec ) average velocity ( cm / ) ] . For cephalic vein , measure basal venous outside diameter ( mm ) venous outer diameter placement tourniquet ( mm ) , distensibility cephalic vein ( % ) upper limb ( UL ) ultrasonography [ Sonoace R3 ( Samsung Medison - South Korea ) ] . A linear transducer 10 megahertz multifrequency ( RUS et al , 2005 ; Kumar et al , 2010 ; RUS et al , 2005 ) use . Handgrip strength Will assess manual dynamometer ( Smedley Dynamometer - Type hand mark Saehan - Korea ) evaluate maximum voluntary contraction ( MVC ) . Will conduct two test rest interval five minute first read , consider great value . Evaluations circumference forearm , vessel morphology handgrip strength perform evaluator intervention , blind randomization patient intervention implementation ( KONG et al , 2014 ) . Intervention Protocol Will run eight week patient , develop five day week ( 2 day supervision physiotherapist outpatient basis 3 day home ) . After randomization , patient divide two group , experimental ( EG ) control ( CG ) . Experimental group For experimental group , hold isometric isotonic concentric flexor muscle elbow wrist use tennis ball , halter handgrip add partial occlusion blood flow tourniquet application . Between exercise modality give two minute apart . Partial occlusion protocol prescription tourniquet treatment : Application tourniquet Will hold conjunction exercise experimental group group determine interview . The partial occlusion blood flow induce inflation tensiometer upper arm stethoscope place medial aspect elbow crease , ( 3M ™ Littmann® Classic II SE , USA ) verify absence arterial pulse . After disappearance sound , cuff deflate slowly , observe first arterial pulse , use 50 % occlusion training , graduate mmHg . This pressure maintain three type exercise grade , include 2-minute interval period rest ( LOENNEKE et al , 2015 ) . Tennis ball For exercise tennis ball , initially 3 set , one series 10 grip ( squeeze last 3 second , 1 second rest ) , increase 5 grip every week , 60 second rest every series . There two minute rest , repeat sequence . After , give two minute rest next activity ( KONG et al , 2014 ) . Halter The exercise perform load 1 kg ( first two week train ) , 2 kg ( last two week first month ) 3 kg last 4 week . The exercise conduct elbow flexion , patient seat . The exercise consist three set 10 movement , maintain shrinkage 3 second , follow 1-second standing ( extension member ) . Between series 10 contraction rest 60 second . 2 give minute rest end , next activity ( SALIMI et al , 2013 ) . Handgrip They perform 3 set dynamic manual hold exercise intensity 40 % MVC , frequency 20 contraction per minute ( duty cycle 2/2 contraction 1 second rest ) . After 3 set 20 contraction , give one minute rest . This activity perform volitional fatigue , record time amount set perform per patient ( Hunt et al , 2012 ; UY et al , 2013 ) . Home program At home perform isometric exercise tennis ball frequency perform ambulatory without apply tensiometer . Will hold two sequence ( 3 set 10 grip ) daily three day week , guide verbally trainer deliver guideline leaflet , material exercise daily control conduct training . Links hold daily help control procedure . Appendix 6 present check-list muscle training experimental group ( Hunt et al , 2012 ) . Group control In control group ( CG ) hold isometric isotonic concentric ambulatory home duration , frequency intensity , except apply tourniquet . Completion program The program end end 3rd day last week completion home procedure , schedule revaluation realization sequence . It record frequency patient outpatient care conduct training home group instructor . Patients carry 75 % program give loss track . Tabulation plan analysis Spreadsheets Data record primarily chip assessment patient , transfer Microsoft Office Excel spreadsheets type , version 2010® later software Statistical Package Social Sciences ( SPSS ) version 20.0 Windows statistical analysis . Statistical method data analysis Initially descriptive data analysis carry , may present mean ± standard deviation , confidence interval 95 % frequency distribution . The normal distribution use continuous variable , use Shapiro-Wilk test homogeneity use Levene 's test . At end program realize Student test pair compare pre post group Mann-Whitney test comparison group non-paired sample . For correlation use Pearson Spearman correlation test . It consider p value le 0.05 significant . For data analysis , SPSS Windows version 20.0 use .
